name: Rob-In-Hoodie
description:
Made for Trijam 97 in 7 hours, 12 minutes.
Save Xerwood from economic meltdown!

Use "Ctrl" to pick the pocket of the rich when they are close and "Space" to throw pouches for the people! Be careful not to give the pouches back to the rich!

For playing on mobile, use the red  (pick pocket) and green (throw pouch) buttons on the screen, you could also play with the two equivalents of "A" and "B" in an Xbox controller.
